// $GOROOT/src/strings/strings.go
func LastIndexAny(s, chars string) int {
    if chars == "" {
        // Avoid scanning all of s.
        return -1
    }
    if len(s) > 8 {
        // ä½œè€…æ³¨ï¼šåœ¨ifæ¡ä»¶æ§åˆ¶è¯­å¥ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨çŸ­å˜é‡å£°æ˜å½¢å¼å£°æ˜äº†ifä»£ç å—ä¸­è¦ä½¿ç”¨çš„å˜é‡aså’ŒisASCII
        if as, isASCII := makeASCIISet(chars); isASCII { 
            for i := len(s) - 1; i >= 0; i-- {
                if as.contains(s[i]) {
                    return i
                }
            }
            return -1
        }
    }
    for i := len(s); i > 0; { 
        // ä½œè€…æ³¨ï¼šåœ¨forå¾ªç¯æ§åˆ¶è¯­å¥ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨çŸ­å˜é‡å£°æ˜å½¢å¼å£°æ˜äº†forä»£ç å—ä¸­è¦ä½¿ç”¨çš„å˜é‡c
        r, size := utf8.DecodeLastRuneInString(s[:i])
        i -= size
        for _, c := range chars {
            if r == c {
                return i
            }
        }
    }
    return -1
}
